PunjabiMovies.title: Singam 2

PunjabiMovies.title: Shootout at Wadala

PunjabiMovies.description: As heavy rains lash Mumbai, a cop on his first assignment faces a life altering decision when he must decide whether to shoot a suspect or not.
PunjabiMovies.title: Monsoon Shootout

PunjabiMovies.description: A man heading towards Rameshwaram via Chennai express to immerse his late grandfather's ashes unwillingly gets caught amidst goons after helping their boss's daughter and them board the train.

PunjabiMovies.title: Krishna Aur Kans

PunjabiMovies.title: Thaandavam

PunjabiMovies.title: Chakravyuh

PunjabiMovies.description: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.
PunjabiMovies.title: Agneepath

PunjabiMovies.description: Officer Muthukumar fights against a dreaded don Gurumurthy, but soon he gets embroiled in a brawl with the corrupt system, following the death of Gurumurthy.
PunjabiMovies.title: Vellore Maavattam

PunjabiMovies.description: A man who has a dream of making easy money, falls in a series of complex situations when he accidentally finds a gangster's phone.
PunjabiMovies.title: Vishnuvardhana

PunjabiMovies.description: Hired to kill a nobleman, the assassin instead falls for the former's unstable wife.

PunjabiMovies.description: A vengeful gangster targets and terrorizes an entire police unit and their families.
PunjabiMovies.title: Force

PunjabiMovies.description: An enraged and influential gangster plans the ultimate vengeance against an honest police officer.
PunjabiMovies.title: Kempe Gowda
